findings.title: Predictable Randomness
findings.description: Timestamp-derived value appears to influence randomness.
findings.recommendation: Use commit-reveal or verifiable randomness source.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.700; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: On-chain Randomness Reliance
findings.description: Contract uses runtime randomness primitive directly.
findings.recommendation: Harden with anti-manipulation logic and delayed settlement where possible.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.700; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Potential Unbounded Loop
findings.description: Execution path depth=50 with loop back-edges detected.
findings.recommendation: Add bounded iteration checks and short-circuit exit conditions.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=2, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.344, penalty=0.086, confidence 0.700->0.614.

findings.title: Timestamp Dependence
findings.recommendation: Do not rely on timestamp for critical authorization or randomness logic.
